bug.author: chethanmahadevaiah
bug.summary: kfctl set-image-name command appends inventory:omitempty: null into all the kustomization.yaml files
bug.description: kfctl set-image-name command appends "inventory:omitempty: null" into all the kustomization.yaml files in the manifests dir Command to reproduce the issue: kfctl set-image-name test-repo.io with this "inventory:omitempty: null" key-value pair in the yaml file, kfctl apply fails.
